entity_profile.reason_of_the_status: This profile is constructed based on consistent references throughout the analysis: the entity is described as involved in manufacturing/sales of complex custom-built equipment (engineering sector), is listed (subject to BSEC rules), reports in BDT, and had its financial statements authorized on March 28, 2025 (implying publication around that date).
entity_profile.status_reference: Basis of Preparation note (pg 45) for year-end, Directors' Report (pg 118) for authorization date, and contextual references to 'listed entity' and 'BSEC rules' throughout Sections 14, 15, and 22.
